name: Age of Ember
description:
When each flame comes of age they must leave their home in order to seek out their coal. The coal becomes a life source for a flame and without it their spark will go out. 

Become a flame surrounded by a forest of mystery and search for your coal. Will you find it before your spark goes out? Or perhaps you'll find something else in the forest.

Created with Unity.

*Game is currently first level only. Comment and suggestions are appreciated.

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
arrow keys - Move
spacebar - Jump
left mouse click - Attack
esc - Pause
